attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You are pouring billions of pounds into the economy, will it work? who knows, you all lack one vital thing, COMMON SENSE.This is what you MUST do and do it  NOW. For the next 12-18 months ABOLISH vat and stamp duty completely, I know it will cost the country untold billions,but if you announced it on monday, can you just imagine the effect it would have, the whole country would spring to life, also savings and pensions should not be taxed, if you need any further help or advice, I would offer my services FREE OF CHARGE.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
